## Scene.getDebugInfo() method

获取场景的调试信息

**Signature:**

```text
getDebugInfo(): {
        name&#58; string;
        entityCount&#58; number;
        processorCount&#58; number;
        isRunning&#58; boolean;
        entities: Array<{
            name&#58; string;
            id&#58; number;
            componentCount&#58; number;
            componentTypes&#58; string[];
        }>;
        processors: Array<{
            name&#58; string;
            updateOrder&#58; number;
            entityCount&#58; number;
        }>;
        componentStats: Map<string, any>;
    };
```
**Returns:**

{ name: string; entityCount: number; processorCount: number; isRunning: boolean; entities: Array&lt;{ name: string; id: number; componentCount: number; componentTypes: string\[\]; }\>; processors: Array&lt;{ name: string; updateOrder: number; entityCount: number; }\>; componentStats: Map&lt;string, any\>; }
